original_title: This Ain't Your Mom's Hardcore Vol. 1
overview: This Aint Your Moms Hardcore, Vol. 1 is a live music video compilation of some of the biggest and best upcoming acts in the music scene today. With superb visual quality and sound, This DVD has never before seen live performances by Underoath, Norma Jean, Haste the Day, On Broken Wings, The Chariot, As Cities Burn, From a Second Story Window, Yesterdays Rising, Dead Poetic, Classic Case, Twelve Gauge Valentine, Secret Lives of the Freemasons, The Beautiful Mistake, and Across Five Aprils! Dont miss out on this highly anticipated DVD. This 100 minute + DVD is sure to keep you entertained for months!
title: This Ain't Your Mom's Hardcore Vol. 1
